question: Coca-Cola, a behemoth in the soft drink market, decides that it is going to develop and market Coca-Cola popsicles. What type of new product would this constitute?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Repositioned products are those that are retargeted for a new use or application.
That’s not correct. Improvements to existing products are current products made better.

answers.text: Improvements and revision to existing products

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. New-to-the-world products are inventions that create a new market.
Remember, new-to-the-firm products aren’t new to the world, but they are a new product venture for the firm.
